## EmbeddedRegion type

Represents the data object of an Embedded Region.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type EmbeddedRegion = Region & {
    ComponentPresentations?: Array<ComponentPresentation>;
    Metadata?: FieldsValueDictionary;
    Regions?: Array<Region>;
    RegionSchema?: Link;
};
```
